Reno.Meadowood Mall:
Meadowood Mall is a one-level, 890,000-square-foot (83,000 m2) super-regional mall in Reno, Nevada, owned and managed by Simon Property Group. Meadowood Mall contains 100 retailers and restaurants and it is anchored by Macy's Women, Macy's Men/Home, Sears, JCPenney, and Dick's Sporting Goods.


== History ==
Meadowood Mall opened in 1978 anchored by JCPenney, Liberty House, and Macy's.
